description: Games Workshop has revealed two new products set for pre-order next Saturday: a new expansion for the game Kill Team, called “Kill Team: Termination,” and a limited edition novel, “Lelith Hesperax: Queen of Knives.” Expansion Details: “Kill Team: Termination” “Kill Team: Termination” introduces two new factions, the Hernkyn Yaegirs and the Genestealer Cults Brood Brothers....
title: Games Workshop Announces New Releases: “Kill Team: Termination” and “Lelith Hesperax: Queen of Knives”

description: Fantasy Flight Games has announced the release of the Ered Mithrin Hero Expansion, now available in the United States. The expansion can be purchased from local retailers or via the Fantasy Flight Games web store. Following the defeat of the dragon Smaug, the city of Dale has emerged as a thriving trade center. A new...
title: Fantasy Flight Games Releases Ered Mithrin Hero Expansion for The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game

description: The 7th Citadel, a cooperative card-based exploration board game by French publisher Serious Poulp, is scheduled for a new Kickstarter campaign starting June 4. This follows a notably successful initial campaign in 2020, which attracted over 33,000 backers and raised in excess of $3.5 million. The upcoming campaign marks the start of a dedicated partnership...
title: The 7th Citadel to Returns to Kickstarter This June

description: Warlord Games has confirmed the appointment of veteran wargames developer Andy Chambers as the head of the writing and development team for Konflikt ‘47. Chambers, whose career includes significant contributions to titles such as Warhammer 40,000 and Blood Red Skies, brings decades of experience to his new role. In his new position, Chambers will focus...
title: Warlord Games Announces Andy Chambers as Lead for Konflikt ‘47 Development Team
